DataElement.preferredName: Was It Worth It Questionnaire One Thing to Improve Experience Participating in Research Study Text
DataElement.preferredDefinition: A person's stated observation of one thing that could have been done to improve their experience in this research study.

DataElementConcept.preferredName: Was It Worth It Questionnaire One Thing to Improve Experience Participating in Research Study
DataElementConcept.preferredDefinition: A questionnaire designed to measure a patient's opinion of their participation in a phase II or III treatment trial and their decision making regarding treatment._A question about the one thing an individual would recommend to improve their experience participating in a research study.
